CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Risk_Rating__c , "Green") , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Green", 20, 40), IF(ISPICKVAL( Risk_Rating__c , "Red") , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Red", 20, 40), IF(ISPICKVAL( Risk_Rating__c , "Amber") , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", "Yellow", 20, 40), "") ) )
CustomField.label: File Checklist Rate
